Nightlight/Trinity/Windlord/Termitron.

Nightlight took in arms Trinity and kissed her little nose, after 
that she left her on floor, Looking to Termitron she said "Termitron 
care her... please don't let that anyone hurt her... "

She left the room and locked them down, Trinity shouted and cried  
calling at Aerotaur and Nightlight. Nightlight ran where Aerotaur was 
and open fire against Partpetron.

"By all Hwaks, what's going on outside???" shouted Windlord while he 
ran outside and open fire against Barrimore.
